Questions.Question: Who is the alter ego of Batman?
Questions.Explanation: Bruce Wayne is the billionaire playboy who fights crime as Batman in Gotham City.

Questions.Question: Which superhero is known for his shield and patriotic colors?
Questions.Explanation: Captain America, also known as Steve Rogers, wields a shield and wears red, white, and blue.

Questions.Question: Who is the arch-nemesis of Spider-Man?
Questions.Explanation: The Green Goblin, also known as Norman Osborn, is Spider-Man's most iconic enemy.

Questions.Question: Which superhero is known for his super speed and red suit?
Questions.Explanation: The Flash, also known as Barry Allen, can run at incredible speeds and wears a red costume.

Questions.Question: Who is the love interest of Superman?
Questions.Explanation: Lois Lane is a journalist and the romantic partner of Superman, also known as Clark Kent.

Questions.Question: Which superhero is known for his adamantium claws and healing factor?
Questions.Explanation: Wolverine, also known as Logan, has retractable adamantium claws and a powerful healing ability.

Questions.Question: Who is the leader of the X-Men?
Questions.Explanation: Professor X, also known as Charles Xavier, is the founder and leader of the X-Men.

Questions.Question: Which superhero is known for his web-slinging abilities?
Questions.Explanation: Spider-Man, also known as Peter Parker, can swing from buildings using his web-shooters.

Questions.Question: Who is the strongest Avenger?
Questions.Explanation: The Hulk, also known as Bruce Banner, possesses immense strength and becomes stronger as he gets angrier.

Questions.Question: Which superhero is known for his green power ring and ability to create constructs?
Questions.Explanation: Green Lantern, also known as Hal Jordan, wields a green power ring that allows him to create energy constructs.

Questions.Question: Who is the main villain in the 'Avengers' movie?
Questions.Explanation: Thanos is a powerful cosmic being who seeks to obtain all six Infinity Stones to achieve ultimate power.

Questions.Question: Which superhero is known for his red and blue costume and ability to fly?
Questions.Explanation: Superman, also known as Clark Kent, possesses superhuman strength, speed, and the ability to fly.

Questions.Question: Who is the love interest of Batman?
Questions.Explanation: Catwoman, also known as Selina Kyle, is a skilled thief and occasional love interest of Batman.

Questions.Question: Which superhero is known for his hammer and control over lightning?
Questions.Explanation: Thor, the Norse god of thunder, wields the enchanted hammer Mjolnir and can summon lightning.

Questions.Question: Who is the arch-nemesis of Iron Man?
Questions.Explanation: The Mandarin is a powerful villain who often clashes with Iron Man, using his ten rings of power.

Questions.Question: Which superhero is known for his detective skills and utility belt?
Questions.Explanation: Batman, also known as Bruce Wayne, is a master detective and relies on his gadgets and utility belt.

Questions.Question: Who is the love interest of Spider-Man?
Questions.Explanation: Mary Jane Watson is a model and actress who becomes the primary love interest of Spider-Man.

Questions.Question: Which superhero is known for his vibranium shield and leadership skills?
Questions.Explanation: Black Panther, also known as T'Challa, is the king of Wakanda and a skilled warrior.

Questions.Question: Who is the arch-nemesis of the X-Men?
Questions.Explanation: Magneto, also known as Erik Lehnsherr, is a mutant with the ability to control magnetic fields and a long-standing enemy of the X-Men.

Questions.Question: Which superhero is known for his red and gold armor and genius intellect?
Questions.Explanation: Iron Man, also known as Tony Stark, is a billionaire inventor who fights crime using his advanced armor.
